name: Greedy Chicken
description:
Greedy Chicken - This is a game about a brave chicken collecting coins. He moves very quickly in short hops over rough terrain. His greed knows no bounds. In pursuit of tokens, he is ready to overcome a variety of dangerous areas, including cold rivers and a busy highway. Help him collect as many rewards as possible and don't get hit by the wheels.

Game features:
- Moving around the cells
- Quick tactics and action planning
- Minimalistic graphics
- One life
